properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config
properties.description: the global configuration,contains weightConfig. registerConfig. routerConfig. discoveryConfig.groupConfig

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.apollo.namespaceName
properties.description: [not required] uniform configuration apollo namespaceName, default value is application.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.apollo.ruleKey
properties.description: [required] uniform configuration apollo ruleKey.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.env.value
properties.description: [required] uniform Configure value directly from the Spring environment variable， for example: [{"serviceId": "demo-a","conditions": "host=*" }].

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.file.file
properties.description: [required] uniform configuration file file-path，for example:classpath:discovery-rule.json.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.nacos.dataId
properties.description: [not required] uniform configuration nacos dataId,defualt value is DEFAULT_GROUP.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.nacos.groupId
properties.description: [required] uniform configuration nacos groupId.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.config.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: [not required] configuration nacos server-addr,read spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr value if it is not configured.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery
properties.description: the configuration of discovery

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.apollo.namespaceName
properties.description: [not required] configuration apollo namespaceName, default value is application.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.apollo.ruleKey
properties.description: [required] configuration apollo ruleKey.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.env.value
properties.description: [required] Configure value directly from the Spring environment variable， for example: [{"serviceId": "demo-a","conditions": "host=*" }].

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.file.file
properties.description: [required] configuration file file-path，for example:classpath:discovery-rule.json.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.nacos.dataId
properties.description: [not required] configuration nacos dataId,defualt value is DEFAULT_GROUP.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.nacos.groupId
properties.description: [required] configuration nacos groupId.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.config.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: [not required] configuration nacos server-addr,read spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr value if it is not configured.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.discovery.enabled
properties.description: [not required] enabled discovery function, default value is true.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.enabled
properties.description: whether to enabled the discovery function

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.group.isolation.enabled
properties.description: whether to enabled gourpIosolation , default is false

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.group.key
properties.description: the configuration of group key, default value is group

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register
properties.description: the configuration of register

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.apollo.namespaceName
properties.description: [not required] configuration apollo namespaceName, default value is application.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.apollo.ruleKey
properties.description: [required] configuration apollo ruleKey.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.env.value
properties.description: [required] Configure value directly from the Spring environment variable， for example: [{"serviceId": "demo-a","conditions": "host=*" }].

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.file.file
properties.description: [required] configuration file file-path，for example:classpath:discovery-rule.json.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.nacos.dataId
properties.description: [not required] configuration nacos dataId,defualt value is DEFAULT_GROUP.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.nacos.groupId
properties.description: [required] configuration nacos groupId.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.config.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: [not required] configuration nacos server-addr,read spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr value if it is not configured.

properties.name: springleaf.smart.discovery.register.enabled
properties.description: [not required] enabled register function, default value is true.
